com.camerontec.util.math

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.math.MathUtils

  • public final class MathUtils
extends Object
    A suite of math functions, similar to Math, that operate on MutableCompactDecimal values.

    • Method Summary

      • abs

        public static MutableCompactDecimal abs(MutableCompactDecimal value,
                                        MutableCompactDecimal target)
        Returns the absolute value of the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - a floating point value - will remain unchanged
        target - the return value - will contain the absolute value
        Returns:
        the target
        Throws:
        ArithmeticException - If the absolute value cannot be computed without loss of precision.
        See Also:
        MutableCompactDecimal.abs()

        Returns:

        TODO: Does not correctly throw on some negative overflows.

        exponent - the exponent
        target - the return value containing the result of the operation

        the target

        Returns:

      • rint

        public static long rint(MutableCompactDecimal value)
        Returns the integer that is equal to or closest to the given value. If two integers are equally close, the even neighbor is returned.
        Parameters:
        value - a floating point value
        Returns:
        the integer that is equal to or closest to the given value

      • round

        public static MutableCompactDecimal round(MutableCompactDecimal value,
                                          int maxDecimalPlaces,
                                          MutableCompactDecimal target)
        Round the given value to the nearest value according to the specified maximum number of decimal places.

        Uses the RoundingMode.HALF_UP rounding method.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to round
        maxDecimalPlaces - the maximum number of decimal places required. Must be 0 or greater.
        target - the return value which will contain the rounded value
        Returns:
        the target
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if maxDecimalPlaces is negative
        See Also:
        RoundingMode.HALF_UP

      • round

        public static long round(MutableCompactDecimal value)
        Round the given value to the nearest integer.

        Uses the RoundingMode.HALF_UP rounding method.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to round
        Returns:
        the rounded value
        See Also:
        RoundingMode.HALF_UP

      • signum

        public static int signum(MutableCompactDecimal value)
        Returns the signum function of the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - a floating point value
        Returns:
        0 if the value is zero, 1 if the value is positive, or -1 if the value is negative
